patthana15.41:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.41:0.3_0: Standing on the side of the skillful, the neck.
patthana15.41:1.1_0: Being committed to the mind, the confused mind doesn’t give rise to mental processes.
patthana15.41:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
patthana15.41:2.1_0: Being committed to the mind, the unskillful phenomena don’t arise with mind.
patthana15.41:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
patthana15.41:2.1_3: (This should be expanded as for the three roots of the following.)
